item.title: Free Microsoft Certifications for Students and Graduates

item.category: "Microsoft Certifications" , "Cloud Computing" , "Artificial Intelligence" , "MSFT Student Cert" , "Azure Fundamentals" , "AI Fundamentals" , "Microsoft 365 Fundamentals" , "Power Platform Fundamentals" , "Dynamics 365 Fundamentals CRM" , "Dynamics 365 Fundamentals ERP" , "Security Compliance and Identity" , "CloudReadySkills" , "Online Education" , "Career Development" , "IT Certification" , "Free Education" , "Online Learning" , "Technical Skills" , "Career Advancement"
item.description: Learn how to boost your employability and expand your skills in cloud computing and artificial intelligence with free Microsoft Certifications available through the MSFT Student Cert program on CloudReadySkills.com.
